name: jest-serializer-stencil
description: A Jest snapshot serializer for Stencil components

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run build && npm version major -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Brett Jankord
